DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether anodal tDCS leave M1 lead decrease GABA concentration alteration functional brain connectivity young people , compare sham tDCS .
DOC.brief_title: tDCS Effects GABA Concentration Brain Functional Connectivity Young Adults
DOC.criteria: unobtrusive neuropsychological screening age : young adult : 1830 year Mild cognitive impairment ( MCI ) neurological disease History severe alcoholism use drug Severe psychiatric disorder depression , psychosis ( remission ) severe untreated medical problem Contraindication MRI ( claustrophobia , metallic implant , ferromagnetic metal body , disorder thermoregulation , pregnant woman )
